review: This is great, it allows me to play anything from my laptop I have open on chrome on my TV. also works with my phone

review: Plugged it in, and five minutes later after setting it up I was consuming irreplaceable minutes of my life watching You tube on the big screen. Is there a reverse on this thing? When you must you this device to dull the pain it works wonderfully, and leaves no hang over. I love it.
author: Tony Serviente "Glass artist"

review: very easy to use, love this thing.  great for streaming your movies or netflix.

review: I am using it from last 4 months it is good only a replacement of your HDMI cable. If you are looking for big app store then it disappoint you. The browser is very good and you can control from your smart phone. There are so many streaming devices are available in market but for this price it's OK.
author: Amazon Customer

review: great product, easy to hook on your TV and to set up

review: Bought one of these for my mom and sister nkether of which are great with electronics but they both adapted to this little guy fast and with great ease. After being out for a year I'd liked to have seen a better range of uses from developers but maybe that is still to come.
